basic_information.scholarship_name: Pandora Tadefa Spanish Education Scholarship Award
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: This scholarship was made possible by a generous gift from the Michael Adam Everett Memorial Fund and the late Dr. Mark Allen Everett. The Everett Family Fund was established at the Oklahoma City Community Foundation by Dr. Mark Everett, father of Howard Dean Everett. This scholarship addresses the demand for Spanish language teachers and is awarded to a student with a major in Spanish Education. Must apply through the OCCF website. Eligibility Requirements Must be enrolled at University of Central Oklahoma Must be a Spanish Education Major Applicants must have a GPA greater than or equal to 3.0. Preference may be given to applicants who demonstrate a commitment to civic and educational affairs in the community

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
